Contributor: Beroroff, artist.; Maus, Delhaille & Urban, printer.;
Description: Text in French and English tells about the bridge where Uncle Sam stopped the Hun in France. The bridge is called the Chateau-Thierry. Illustration shows the bridge.
Digital Collection: Allied Posters of World War I
